item.title: Installing Docker on Ubuntu
item.description: Installing Docker on Ubuntu should be easy, right? Turns out yes…​ but only if you go about it the right way. The Right (Easy) Way Save yourself some hassle by installing Docker as packaged per your version of Ubuntu. I use docker-compose, and installing its package with apt also installs Docker. $apt install docker-compose If you just want to install Docker without docker-compose, install the docker.
